name: Paula
0:
”Alexa, ask paula bot Can I continue to use FMLA for leave due to my chronic serious health condition”
”Alexa, ask paula bot if I am required to prove that I have a serious health condition”
”Alexa, ask paula bot What happens if my employer says my medical certification is incomplete”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: paula bot
des: Paula BOT helps user questions on FLMA. This bot gives responses to FMLA FAQ and FLMA Rules.
